recipe.title: Pesto Vinaigrette
ingredients: 1 cup coarsely chopped fresh parsley leaves
instructions: Combine first 6 ingredients in processor and process until finely chopped. With machine running, gradually add oil abd blend well. Transfer to samll bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
